content.rendered:
Directed by Lalit Mohan. Lalit Mohan. Cast (in credits order) . Karanvir Bohr. Priya Banerje. Rest of cast listed alphabetically. Mahesh Balra. Juhi Chawl. Sameer Kochha. Produced by. Karanvir Bohra. Deepak Panth.

Cast Priya Banerjee(Ananya Tripathi) . Mahesh Balraj(Inspector sherawat). Juhi Chawla(Cameo). Sameer Kochhar(Ranveer) .

Language Hindi.

Producer Deepak Panth.

Production Firebird Entertainment.
